articles.author: David Cohen
articles.title: Selection of RFK Jr. will amplify discussion of public health, Deborah Birx says - POLITICO
articles.description: "What I'm hoping is he brings his transparency for all Americans and we really start to tackle these issues one-by-one-by-one," she said.
articles.content:
Birx saw a real advantage in having a highly public discussion about complex topics.
What I know for sure, she said, is hes a very smart man who can bring his data and his evidence base forward, and… [+1409 chars]
